body.name: Modefa Islamic Prayer Rug - Double Plush Large & Wide Velvet Carpet - Traditional Muslim Janamaz Sajada - Thick Turkish Prayer Mat for Men & Women- Ramadan or Eid Gift - Floral Mihrab (Navy Blue)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 10 mins
features: Modefa Islamic Prayer Rug ---> Looking for a sajjadah with extra cushion? You've found it! Our Double Plush praying rug are one of our thickest and largest single person velvet prayer rugs, helping to provide Muslims with a comfortable experience during salat. Amazing plush praying carpet that makes for a good Muslim gifts for men or Muslim gifts for women for any special occasion! Great Ramadan gifts for women!

Why We Love It---> The beautiful, traditional mihrab pattern on this Muslim prayer mat gives it an elegant look. Combine this with the luscious softness and thickness that our plush salah mat are known for, and you've got a pray carpet that is sure to wow. This large prayer rug is the perfect Islamic gift or Eid gift or Ramadan gifts! Great Turkish prayer rug and wonderful Islamic gifts for women!

Thickness Scale ---> 8/10: Our Modefa Thickness Rating on this Muslim prayer rug is a 8 out of 10. This means it is a thick prayer mat and is thicker than most prayer rugs. The thickness on this Muslim praying mat makes it great for using on harder floors. Great Muslim rug and thick prayer rug for daily salah prayers for Muslims. Every Muslim needs a good quality sajadah praying mat to perform the prayers as prescribed in Islam.

Quality You Can Feel ---> Our namaz mat are made in Turkey, so you know it is quality you can trust! Our plush prayer rug are made of high quality, dense velvet and are super soft to the touch. These sajada are machine made, but hand-finished with the best workmanship Turkey has to offer. For centuries, Turkey has been a renowned producer of Islamic prayer rugs. You can rest easy knowing you pray namaz on a Turkish prayer carpet that has been ethically produced in Turkish factories.

Specifications ---> Size: 80 x 120cm ( 31.5 x 47.25) with a 2-inch fringe on each end | Material: Dense Velvet | Care: Hand wash, line dry for best results. May be washed on gentle cycle, cold, in a washing machine, but be aware that the tassels may come loose. We do not recommend regular washing. | Weight: 2.5lbs

productInformation.value: #329,362 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #2,562 in Area Rugs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love this prayer rug! It's plush and very soft, just as described. The shade of blue is slightly lighter than the picture, but it's beautiful. This is the second prayer rug I've bought from this company. I previously purchased one for my daughter and she loves hers. Her prayer rug is actually more beautiful than the picture. It's well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very well made. Roomy and thick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, nice thickness
reviews.reviewText: I bought these rugs for accent decoration in my bedroom. I love the look, they are plush to stand on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at the craftsmanship of this relatively inexpensive prayer rug. It's a soft place to make sujood and the pattern is deeply textured over the gold threads. It's so beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth more than 5 star
reviews.reviewText: Love it , this is my 3rd prayer rug ordered. 1st one was for me and all my friends love it and last week I ordered for my friend and for his wife as a gift. Absolutely an amazing beautiful Turkish rug. I wish I can give 10 star

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great prayer rug if you want to spend the money
reviews.reviewText: I was really impressed upon receiving it. Although it is pricey, it is very high quality, thick and better than what it looks like in the pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It sheds more than 10 cats
reviews.reviewText: We kept finding mysterious red fiber throughout the house. Good thing my wife is not jealous or I'd be in trouble. It sheds more than 10 cats, so much so that it clogged the washing machine filter!Exaggerating of course, but it does shed fibers. Thickness - good, size - good, price a little on the high side. Overall good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice looking, very comfortable for the knees, and it is big enough for two people at the same time!
reviews.reviewText: Very soft and plushy.I placed this in a campus prayer space where over 2 dozens students use it daily. It is very soft on the knees and looks exactly like the pictures.A great prayer rug. It is also big enough for two people to pray on it at the same time (while it is vertical) and up to 3-4 people when it is horizontal.Definitely recommend
